channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole, 29th May
item.description:
Pothole was filled in, but not done to a decent standard. The filling has simply collapsed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 36 Whaddon Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes, 29th May
item.description:
Multiple portholes at this cross road on Severn road and whaddon road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 77b Cleeve View Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tip on Cleeve Common Road Passing Place, 29th May
item.description:
The location is the Cleeve Common Road which is about a quarter of a mile going towards the common from the Lone Tree Crossroads on the right hand side in a passing place. The tip consist of various plastic containers, papers, and general fast food packaging waste and was likely done onFriday 28th May sometime in the evening. Please can it be removed as quickly as possible as the local widlife will likely spread the food waste around..

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cleeve Common, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stoke Road Dean Brook riverbank overgrown and requires cutting back, 27th May
item.description:
The riverbank alongside Stoke Road Old Forge Cottages are overgrown on the public footpath/pavement side and need cutting back otherwise it will hinder the narrow pavement space for buggies and pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 5 Old Forge Cottage Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole, 27th May
item.description:
Large and deep pothole in Hucclecote Road opposite entrance to Folland Avenue. Some evidence of yellow markings around it but they look old and it's possible it has been attended recently but ground has dropped again. Vehicles are swerving to avoid and this could cause accidents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 153 Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 23 Paynes Pitch, Churchdown

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 13 Elmfield Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Road Sign Damaged - Yet Again!, 24th May
item.description:
The location is the crossroads at the junction of Cleeve Common Road, Whittington Road, and Aggs Hill / Cheltenham. This sign has JUST been repaired after 2 YEARS. It now seems the finger post has slid down the main post - see pictures. In addition, a finger post pointing in the Cheltenham direction has not been replaced during the recent repair and several drivers have ended up at Cleeve Common. Please can this sign be repaired again and hopefully it will last this time :-)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footpath and footpath signpost, 24th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Sunnybank Cottage Dog Lane, Witcombe
